name: Retro Abyss
description:
Controls: Computer mouse and space bar
  1. Left click -- Creating a block "left"
  2. Right click -- Creating a block "right"
  3. Mouse wheel (click) -- Creating a block "solid"
  4. Space bar -- Destroy all blocks

There are flaws in the game. The character often gets stuck half way.

To resolve this problem, use any block pushing the main character.

The Retro Abyss project will tell a short story about a creature from the ancient depths - a minion. Penetrating into the world of people by order of his master, God Cthulhu, the minion wants to find and destroy all the scrolls with references to ancient deities. The scrolls are stored in chests, which are hidden at the levels and serve as the final target. The main character will have to make a convenient path for himself and go through the sewers, underground dwellings of unknown creatures, and also complete all the orders of the master

"Cthulhu ph'nglui in R'leikhe fhtagn".
